title: Parental Controls: Application Access (com.apple.applicationaccess.new)
description: Configures Parental Controls: Application Access settings

familyControlsEnabled.title: Enable application access restrictions
familyControlsEnabled.description: Set to true to enable application access restrictions.

appID.title: Code Requirement
appID.description: The designated requirement describing the code signature of this executable.

subApps.description: For applications that include nested helper applications, describes the signatures of embedded applications.

detachedSignature.description: The required signature for an unsigned binary

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: Specifies whether this application information is to be included in the allowlist or not.

whiteList.title: Allowlisted Applications by Code Signature
whiteList.description: List of code signatures for applications that are allowed to run.

items.title: Folder Path
items.description: The absolute path to a folder to allowlist.

pathWhiteList.title: Allowlisted Application Folders
pathWhiteList.description: The user can always launch applications in these folders.

items.title: Folder Path
items.description: The absolute path to a folder to denylist.

pathBlackList.title: Denylisted Application Folders
pathBlackList.description: The user can never launch applications in these folders.
